snippet: The U.N. called on Nigeria on Tuesday to restore law and order in its northeast and to investigate mass killings of civilians said to have been carried out by Boko Haram insurgents.
abstract: United Nations urges Nigeria to restore law and order in northeast and probe mass killings of civilians reportedly committed by Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: The U.N. called on Nigeria on Tuesday to restore law and order in its northeast and to investigate mass killings of civilians said to have been carried out by Boko Haram insurgents.

headline.main: Nigeria: United Nations Calls for an Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: U.N. Calls for an Inquiry
